Introducing $END

$END is a premium digital currency created by Endless Clouds Foundation that will power Treeverse. It will be used to buy exclusive cosmetics, in game features and more. View the whitepaper here.

$END has a total supply of 500,000,000 tokens starting with a circulating supply of 155,500,000 (31.1%).

The tokenomics are presented below:

$END is not tradeable straight away on claim. Trading is expected to be enabled on Monday, 7th July 2025. For exact time, keep an eye on official announcements from @EndlessCFDN X.

$END initial distribution consists of:

  • 17.5%: NFT Snapshot taken on 4PM GST of 27th June 2025

  • 9.0705%: Ecosystem, 2% will be sent to MMs on TGE

  • 2.7675%: S1 Reward Airdrop that will be airdropped before trading goes live on Immutable zkEVM

  • 0.912%: Investors on TGE for 10% of their total allocation at 30M/40M FDV

  • 0.85%: 0.35% to MON questers, 0.3% to Immutable and 0.2% to IMX Stakers

Reminder: S1 players do NOT have to claim through the site today, they will be airdropped before trading is enabled.

ETH L1 CA: 0x2BbD8602091bd1B90797d894163c0DE76045F71c

Immutable zkEVM CA: 0x43D7B1F2E92c620FC45cC81d3818E4620AbaF240

Claim through the official site below! Check if you are eligible without connecting your wallet. Delegate is supported. The domain is endlesscfdn.com â be careful of scams.
